page.title: 04Children's choice of music
page.content: Children nowadays have taken to pop music.It is now part of their everyday lives.Top of the pops was voted best pop show on the air and has been on the air for about 25 years.Every year people of the public are chosen to vote at the awards for best male singer,best female singer ect.In my survey of the class wham was the most popular with Paul Young second.These pop artists have won several awards at the National Ceremony,Fankie goes to Hollywood had 3 number one hits in a row the first hit 'RELAX' was banned by disc jockey Mike Read due to bad lyrics. Young people today ecspecially girls go for good clothes and nice looks in performers.There are about twice as many male as female singers. Many females are in backing groups.
